sharedBucketRead: Shared Bucket, Open for Public Read
sharedBucketReadWrite: Shared Bucket, Open for Public Read and Write
noBucket: You haven't created any buckets yet
confirmDeleteBucket: Are you sure you want to delete this bucket? This action will delete all data in the bucket.
enterValidBucketName: Please enter a valid bucket name
bucketNameInvalid: The bucket name contains invalid characters. Names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and dots (.). Names must not start or end with a hyphen (-) or a dot (.).
bucketNameDotWarning: Note: Names with dots (.) are best for static sites with custom domains. For general storage, use hyphens (-) to avoid certificate errors on default HTTPS connections.
